name: Dim Lights
description:
Dim Lights is a videogame inspired by the popular game "Escape Room" in which the player has to complete puzzle games in order to escape. The main objective of this game is to find the exit in the least amount of time.

In order to make my game differ from the rest, I added intentional bugs and logic to make the player think outside the box and find a solution which is generally not the most obvious. I payed close attention to the style and music of the game to convey a sense of mysteriousness to the player.
